segway.Name: Custom
segway.Description: Design and create your own special segway with our custom options.

segway.Name: Default
segway.Description: Seg-Bois classic model segway with regular tires, bluetooth speakers, electric engine, and a slick black finish for our classy riders.

segway.Name: Memester
segway.Description: Only the greatest meme master can handle our pimped out Memester, built with petrol engine, our regular tries, deep fried paint job, and bluetooth speaker.

segway.Name: Little Kid
segway.Description: For our beginner riders we have a special segway built with unique bike tires, electric engine, and a slick blue finish with tassels, a horn, and a basket to make them the cool kid around the block.

segway.Name: Rich Kid
segway.Description: Seg-Bois rich kid segway will make any rider feel like gold as it's built with normal tires, dual engines, with a slick gold finish, glitter skin, extra batteries, and nice cup holder for only the fanciest riders.

segway.Name: Deep South
segway.Description: For our deep southern customers Seg-Bois has our Deep South segway ready and waiting for you to ride as it's built with classic tractor tires, petrol engine, nice cup holders, a horn, and a slick green finish just like the trackers back home.
